name: Michaela's Portfolio
body:
# Introduction
My name is Michaela Erickson and I am a programming student at Johnson County Community College. I have taken a couple of programming classes because I find them very interesting, although I do not believe I will make a career out of programming. Below are a few of my projects.

# Contact Information
Email: Mlerickson95@gmail.com
